review_title: Singapore office - overworked, underpaid with a boss who shifts goal posts and doesn't trust/micromanages
pros:
Good network to many stakeholders,
Interesting and meaningful work and interesting to get the corporate view on sustainability - surprisingly some are advanced
Diverse team
cons:
Boss is horrible, keeps pushing the goal post, and does not trust employees, micromanages everything
Larger management committee than the number of employees - that really slows down processes
Leadership is more worried about profit than the purpose
Treat employees quite badly, in spite of them being underpaid
Very low salaries, while overtime work is expected
Never got my name card, health insurance details even till the end
